code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white M curator aged 47 years presents with mild constriction in eye field x 4 days. patient also complains of mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather, mild difficulty seeing colors, especially blue. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 70 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered refractive error testing.

s:patient C/O mild difficulty seeing colors, especially blue, mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather and mild constriction in eye field. NKDA. patient is a 48 yr old white male. o:Height 70 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered refractive error testing.
